title: Remove Maui Lane logo/icon rendering from header and favicon

requirements.summary: Remove Maui Lane Care Home logo rendering and any fallback-to-icon behavior from the authenticated app shell header, leaving a text-only header title.
acceptanceCriteria: The Maui app header no longer renders an image element for the logo/icon and displays the title as text only.
There is no broken image placeholder in the header on any route.
The app no longer attempts to load /assets/generated/maui-lane-logo.dim_512x512.png or /assets/generated/maui-lane-app-icon.dim_256x256.png as part of the header rendering.

file_operations.description: Remove the logo element and the logo state/error fallback logic so the header renders only the text title (and preserves existing sign-out behavior and authenticated shell structure).

requirements.summary: Remove Maui Lane generated app-icon usage as the HTML favicon so the app does not reference the generated icon file in the icon link tag.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html no longer references %BASE_URL%assets/generated/maui-lane-app-icon.dim_256x256.png as the favicon.
Loading the app does not trigger a favicon request for the generated Maui icon file.

file_operations.description: Update the <link rel="icon"> declaration to remove the reference to %BASE_URL%assets/generated/maui-lane-app-icon.dim_256x256.png (either remove the tag entirely or switch it to a non-generated default favicon path).
